title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 December 2012 - XWiki
content:
<sdumitriu1> has quit  
00:35 <fmancinelli> has quit  
00:56 <jvdrean> has quit  
03:23 <tekzilla> has quit  
03:24 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
05:35 <huhongbo> has joined #xwiki  
07:01 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:29 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:31 <vmassol> sdumitriu: thanks a lot! :)  
08:31 <sdumitriu> What for?  
08:32 <vmassol> you fixed something I've been wanting for a long tie  
08:32 <vmassol> being able to press ctrl+G on the xwiki.org home page  
08:32 <vmassol> :)  
08:32 <sdumitriu> Ah, you mean http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKIORG-40 ?  
08:32 <vmassol> yep  
08:32 <sdumitriu> Yes, that's what I wanted to fix originally  
08:32 <sdumitriu> I ended up rewriting the whole Carousel code  
08:34 <sdumitriu> vmassol: I noticed a weird notification:  
08:35 <sdumitriu> xwiki:XWiki.evalica was modified by xwiki:XWiki.tivalat (Updated WatchList) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/evalica?viewer=changes&rev2=9.9  
08:35 <vmassol> indeed  
08:35 <sdumitriu> Wrong user watchlist updated for a change  
08:35 <vmassol> wrong author  
08:35 <vmassol> yep  
08:35 <vmassol> brb  
08:36 <huhongbo> what is the best way to include the other site page iframe seems not work  
08:56 <vmassol> has quit  
08:56 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:17 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:08 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
11:08 <vmassol> !news  
11:10 <vmassol> devs  
11:10 <vmassol> we have a new yourkit license  
11:10 <vmassol> http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DevelopmentToolLicenses#HYourKitOpenSourceLicensesforXWiki  
11:28 <vmassol> BFD #8: http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/Dashboard.jspa?selectPageId=11293  
11:29 <vmassol> mflorea: Id on't see any commit for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-4905?page=com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-bitbucket-connector-plugin:dvcs-commits-tabpanel  
11:29 <vmassol> did you push? :)  
11:31 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <mflorea> vmassol: not yet, I have it locally. I  
11:35 <mflorea> I'll push my local commits before lunch  
11:37 <vmassol> mflorea: ah ok, because you closed the issue, so I thought it was fixed already :)  
11:44 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
11:45 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
11:48 <vmassol> mflorea: maybe this is a good one for you for the BFD: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8375?focusedCommentId=72956#comment-72956 ?  
11:48 <mflorea> ok, I'll take a look later  
11:48 <vmassol> I can reproduce every time so should not be too hard  
11:53 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
13:00 <vmassol> guys  
13:00 <vmassol> I've added a new translation key  
13:00 <vmassol> should I update l10n now?  
13:01 <vmassol> issue is that it takes long...  
13:01 <vmassol> anyway will try now since I'd like to add the French translation for it....  
13:01 <vmassol> started....  
13:12 <vmassol> Enygma`: could you check if http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8548# is also failing for SOLR?  
13:16 <Enygma`> vmassol: yes, you have to reload the translations in l10n to have the new key translatable on the site.  
13:16 <vmassol> Enygma`: yes I know  
13:16 <vmassol> (that wasn't my question)  
13:16 <vmassol> (but anyway I've done it and it "only" took 10 minutes in the end...)  
13:17 <Enygma`> re the search problem, no, it does not affect Solr  
13:17 <Enygma`> I`ve just tested "\*est" and "?est" and both queries find the term "test"  
13:18 <vmassol> can you test  
13:18 <vmassol> with just \*  
13:18 <vmassol> as the full input  
13:18 <vmassol> ?  
13:18 <Enygma`> \* matches everything  
13:18 <Enygma`> (as in, it works)  
13:19 <vmassol> ok  
13:19 <Enygma`> and \*:\* matches every property and every value  
13:21 <vmassol> actually l10n must still be processing since I can't do aynthing on it  
13:26 <vmassol> Enygma`: I'm proposing to remove '\*' or '?' if it's the first character for the lucene search, wdyt?  
13:27 <vmassol> (since it's not supported)  
13:28 <Enygma`> might not be what the user expects to see, but at least he doesn`t get an ugly exception...  
13:33 <vmassol> Enygma`: he cannot get what he expects since it's not supported  
13:34 <vmassol> the best solution would be an error message but that's a bit beyond what I'd like to do now  
13:40 <mflorea> has quit  
13:44 <vmassol> !search \*  
13:44 <vmassol> hehe :)  
13:46 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:47 <vmassol> !search \*  
13:47 <vmassol> arf  
13:47 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:47 <vmassol> !search \*  
13:48 <vmassol> grrr  
13:48 <vmassol> ah yes stupid me  
13:49 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:49 <vmassol> !search \*  
13:50 <vmassol> !search \*test  
13:50 <vmassol> ok got it fixing  
13:52 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:52 <vmassol> !search  
13:52 <vmassol> !search \*  
13:58 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:59 <vmassol> !search  
14:02 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:02 <vmassol> should be ok now....  
14:02 <vmassol> ahah  
14:02 <vmassol> it isn't...  
14:03 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:03 <vmassol> !search  
14:03 <vmassol> dd  
14:05 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:05 <vmassol> !search  
14:05 <vmassol> !search \*  
14:06 <vmassol> good  
14:08 <cjd> !search '$doc.fullName  
14:11 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
14:13 <cjd> Good morning fmancinelli, you had a question yesterday?  
14:15 <vmassol> Enygma`: any idea why http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Platform/WebHome shows Workspaces?  
14:15 <vmassol> I'm looking for platform resources  
14:16 <vmassol> ok found it in XE, strange  
14:16 <Enygma`> vmassol: yes, Platform is supposed to be a container for xwiki-platform modules  
14:16 <vmassol> and oldcore is not a platform module?  
14:16 <Enygma`> Wiki Manager should be there as well, but tmortagne did not have the time to move everything since there is no easy way to move translations right now on l10n  
14:17 <vmassol> ok  
14:18 <vmassol> 62 issues to go!  
14:19 <vmassol> our previous BFD had 65 issues closed: http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/Dashboard.jspa?selectPageId=11201  
14:19 <vmassol> we're at 16 ATM: http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/Dashboard.jspa?selectPageId=11293  
14:19 <vmassol> s/16/19  
14:20 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:25 <evalica> don't forget to add the Label  
14:25 <evalica> hmmm  
14:25 <evalica> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XRENDERING-262  
14:25 <evalica> you didn't put it because is an improvement? vmassol  
14:26 <evalica> still I think it should be put  
15:08 <Michitux> has quit  
15:09 <Michitux> has joined #xwiki  
15:15 <vmassol> evalica: yes BFD is only about reducing the bug count  
15:15 <vmassol> we must absolutely not put any label on something other than a bug that reduces this bug count  
15:15 <vmassol> this day has only 1 goal  
15:15 <vmassol> to reduce this:  
15:15 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/Dashboard.jspa?selectPageId=10000#Created-vs-Resolved-Chart/10470  
15:16 <vmassol> anything that doesn't reduce must not be have the label  
15:16 <cjd> and anything that does must?  
15:16 <vmassol> yep  
15:16 <vmassol> pretty simple, isn't it? :)  
15:16 <cjd> :)  
15:16 <vmassol> that's ok  
15:16 <vmassol> well  
15:17 <vmassol> hehe  
15:17 <vmassol> that's tricky  
15:17 <vmassol> it doesn't change this bug count  
15:17 <vmassol> there was a mistake initially  
15:17 <vmassol> depends how we view it  
15:17 <vmassol> this is really an edge case  
15:17 <cjd> XWIKI-7749 <-- I'm doing this one too though so 1 easy 2 hard  
15:17 <vmassol> technically I think we shouldn't count it cjd  
15:18 <cjd> Actually it's pretty easy, as usual it's testing the rat's nest that's hard  
15:18 <vmassol> since it's not a bug  
15:35 <sburjan> vmassol: Talked to Ludovic, and I am gonna report another issue about Office Importer. This is nastier because I can't chop the file properly :(  
15:36 <sburjan> but this should be the second and the last one which if we fix, we should be OK with Office Importer  
15:49 <evalica> has quit  
15:49 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
15:55 <evalica1> is now known as <evalica>  
16:04 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:20 <polx> has quit  
17:05 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
17:06 <msmeria> has quit  
17:14 <vmassol> you got me sdumitriu by 5 seconds ;)  
17:53 <vmassol> Enygma`: I think you should be more careful when closing  
17:53 <vmassol> I've seen several issues where you've closed without even trying to reproduce  
17:53 <vmassol> and IMO the issues can still be there  
17:53 <vmassol> (just commented on the oracle one)  
17:54 <vmassol> I worked on oracle but didn't work on that one, nor did I check it so it's very likely the issue is still there  
17:54 <vmassol> now it's true that it's old but still don't you think we should try to reproduce before closing?  
17:54 <vmassol> (it's not hard to do either)  
17:55 <vmassol> actually looks like a weblogic issue :)  
17:56 <vmassol> we have 2 strategies: 1) take old issue and close them all  and wait for people to reopen if the problem is still there  
17:57 <vmassol> 2) verify and only close those we cannot reproduce and for which we have a high reason to believe they're fixed  
17:57 <vmassol> oh forgot the time, gtg, bbl :)  
18:03 <sburjan> has quit  
18:06 <Enygma`> vmassol: I know. I was unsure about the Oracle one, but since it's about XWiki 1.7, I decided to go with strategy 1). I generally try to reproduce and I try to be careful with the issues I close. :) However, some issues take too much setup work and are too old and too inactive, like this one was.  
18:09 <evalica> has quit  
18:13 <vmassol> yeah 1.7 is old indeed  
18:13 <vmassol> FYI I have an oracle setup  
18:28 <jvdrean> has quit  
18:32 <Denis> cjd: the attachment porter is not available through EM, any good reason or just no time to look at it ?  
18:36 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:40 <jvelo> has quit  
18:57 <Denis> Currently migrating from 3.1 to 4.3, the way relative links of included document get resolved seems to have changed, now these get resolved based on the including document, not the included document. Is this really the intended behavior ? It is blocker for my migration and seems a serious regression to me.

21:47 <Denis> I am afraid that $services.uix.getExtensions() does not provide panels in an ordered maner  
21:47 <sburjan`> Denis: yes, it's known in 4.3. JV has reported it  
21:48 <Denis> so 4.3 is simply unusable, should be said somewhere  
21:48 <sburjan`> yes, we should put that information in the RN  
21:49 <Denis> oh, there was so in the RN  
21:50 <Denis> just it cames after I read it :(  
21:50 <Denis> sburjan`: do you know when 4.3.1 is planed ?  
21:51 <Denis> (to be released)  
21:51 <sburjan`> Denis: no idea  
22:23 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
22:35 <vmassol> Denis: when jvdrean finishes his commits and someone volunteers ;)
